page.title: 19 Helping Africa
page.content: This year there has been a very bad famine in Africa and millions of people are dying. This has been a major{social concern}for many people. We have been helping in several ways. First of all we collected lots of money in a jar which we sent to help buy food and blankets to be taken to{Africa. As well as collecting for our own {harvest}we also collected lentils, dry peas, wholemeal flour and sugar. We had to take them to Colchester and load them onto the train which will take the food to a port to be shipped to Africa. We all feel very sad about what is happening to the poor people in Africa and we hope that our food will help save their lives.
